body_html:
Had a similar issue but was related to the fact that the example is looking for a specific 480x320 camera preview size, see:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/examples/android/src/org/tensorflow/demo/CameraConnectionFragment.java#L231

Just changed that line to: if (option.getHeight() > 320 && option.getWidth() > 480) and it worked.
body_text:
Had a similar issue but was related to the fact that the example is looking for a specific 480x320 camera preview size, see:

Just changed that line to: if (option.getHeight() > 320 && option.getWidth() > 480) and it worked.
body:
Had a similar issue but was related to the fact that the example is looking for a specific 480x320 camera preview size, see:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/examples/android/src/org/tensorflow/demo/CameraConnectionFragment.java#L231

Just changed that line to: `if (option.getHeight() > 320 && option.getWidth() > 480)` and it worked.
